===Etymology===
From {{m|zh|九||[[nine]]}} + {{m|zh|段||[[part]], [[section]]}} + {{m|zh|沙||[[sands]]; [[sandbar]]; [[shoal]]}}, from colloquial Chinese use of 九 in the sense of {{term|several}} or {{term|multiple}}. In fact, the area now comprises four main shoals.
